resources.string: "It's not your typical PG accommodation. Tamarindo House by Stanza Living is your second home. It's so because, in this fully-furnished PG in Bangalore, you'll find home-like comforts waiting for you. Professional housekeeping services, high-speed internet, delicious and nutritious homely meals, and our many other amenities won't let you miss home, even hundreds of miles away from it. Besides a comfortable lifestyle, we also know you love technology. So we've integrated it into your living experience, with the Stanza Living - Resident App, AI-generated menus, biometric security, and other one-of-a-kind tech-integrations. But with modern technology, we also have the bandwidth for some old-school real-world bonding. Our regularly organized game nights, movie screenings, and other community events are perfect for making memories with your fellow residents, so that pretty soon, you become a part of the Stanza Living family. And since you're family to us, we're implementing the very best-in-class safety measures - from thermal monitoring to regular residence sanitization - to protect you from COVID-19. After all, that's what family is for. All this and more sets Tamarindo House apart from any PG in Hosur Road. But if you're still unsure, that's alright. In fact, we'd like you to drop by for a visit and see for yourself, what makes your second home, your second home."
